items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOFT!
items.body: Stunning sweater. It’s incredibly soft. Read more
items.author: Niki

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy & Cute, But Color and Pattern Were a Letdown for Me
items.body: I really wanted to love the Dancing Yarns Women's Oversized Sweater — and in some ways, I do! The fabric is incredibly soft, and the oversized, baggy fit is super cozy and comfortable. The lantern sleeves are also a lovely touch and give the sweater a unique, feminine flair. Fit-wise, I’d say it runs true to size — even for an oversized style. It’s roomy without being shapeless, so if you’re aiming for that relaxed look, you won’t need to size up. That said, I was disappointed with the color I ordered (Ancora Red). In the product images, it looked like a vibrant, rich red, but in person, it leans more toward a muted wine color — not quite as flattering or eye-catching as I hoped. The knit pattern on the torso also reminds me of sweaters from the early '90s — eclectic and a bit too busy for my taste, especially when combined with the voluminous sleeves. It just didn’t quite come together for me style-wise. I haven’t worn it out yet since the weather’s still warm, but it definitely feels like it will be warm and cozy come fall and winter. One small downside: I accidentally snagged it on some jewelry while it was hanging in my closet, and now it has a pull in the fabric before I even got to wear it. So be mindful that the acrylic fibers can be delicate around anything sharp or textured. Overall, I’d recommend this sweater if you genuinely love the torso pattern — it's soft, warm, and comfortable. Versatile enough to be tucked in or let it hang! Just be sure to check out the product video (especially the white version), as that gave a more accurate idea of what the sweater really looks like in person. Read more
items.author: ASDiaz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drop shoulder, deep vibrant color
items.body: Vibrant, rich red and soft knit sweater. The drop shoulders and slightly ballooned sleeves make it more interesting than a plain old sweater. It also features a different knit pattern across the bottom half which was not noticeable in the product photos, but I like it. It is extremely comfortable, and because it has polyester you don’t feel overheated. It does appear to have a slight pull in front but I think that will flatten out with some tugging. Read more
items.author: At Vincent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rich bold cranberry colored ribbed sweater
items.body: The rich cranberry color is a favorite of my daughter so when I saw this ribbed crewneck knit sweater, I knew I had to order it. The sweater is oversized so it is intended to be loose fitting. The ribbing on the sweater has two different patterns which you can see in the photo online. The sweater has washed well and the quality of it is as I expected. Read more
items.author: VisualSol

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but is it a towel?
items.body: The sweater is comfortable but I feel like it looks more like towel material. Read more
items.author: Lindsay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Bright white
items.body: I do like the style and fit of this sweater. I'm 5'2" and 127lbs and the small fits perfectly oversized. Just and FYI - the white is NOT white, its Ivory Read more
items.author: DailyAmazonShopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but arrived with a snag
items.body: This sweater arrived with a noticeable snag right on the front. I tried to get a photo, but I cracked the camera glass on my phone yesterday, so any picture I take now is just a blurry, distorted glare. Thankfully, I was able to pull the snag through to the inside and then stretch the fabric a bit to redistribute the yarn, so it's not visible anymore. Once I got past that, I found that I really like this sweater. The material is soft but also has a little bit of a firmness to it. I'm a big fan of the sleeves, which are slightly poofy but tapered at the wrists. The fit is mostly true to size, with a slight lean towards being larger, but I believe that's the intended style. This isn't a piece I would wear in the dead of winter without a jacket, but it’s perfect for fall. The colors are also true to what was shown on the product page. While it seems well-made, the knitted pattern means you'll probably have to be careful with it, as evidenced by mine arriving already snagged. Still, I'm happy with the purchase. --- For anyone interested, the exact product I purchased was listed as: DancingYarns Women’s Oversized Sweaters Long Lantern Sleeve Pullover Sweaters Trendy Crewneck Knit Casual Loose Jumper Tops (Grey, X-Large) The ASIN for the version I received was: B0FJMFWJZF Read more
items.author: Sam Fisher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater! Great quality and true to size!
items.body: This sweater is very nice. I love the color of it. It is very true to size. I got it for one of my daughters who is a small to medium. I got the medium for her and it fit perfectly and is loose how she likes sweaters. She really likes that it is made oversized. So you can safely order your normal size. The material is very soft and it will definitely keep you warm in cooler weather. It’s not to heavy but also not to thin. Per the care instructions, I will definitely either wash on cold on gentle or hand wash and hang to dry. That way it keeps its shape and the color doesn’t fade. This sweater is definitely worth the cost for the quality. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Crystal

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taupe, Khaki, White, Cream White, Moss Green, Black, Ancora Red, Grey, Coffee Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
